Title: Shaft
Writer: Ernest Tidyman (based upon the character John Shaft from the novel by), Kenya Barris, Alex Barnow
Actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Jessie T. Usher, Richard Roundtree, Regina Hall
Plot: JJ Shaft, a cyber security expert with a degree from MIT, enlists his family's help to uncover the truth behind his best friend's untimely death.
Production: Khalabo Ink Society, New Line Cinema, Davis Entertainment, Warner Bros. Pictures
